title: (15841) Santa Comba - Cusaduira
description: Recreational area next to river beach. Barbecues, tables, plenty of shade and bathrooms.

title: (15859) Zas - 32 AC-441
description: Free car park and picnic facilities. Also parking by the river. The site is the position of an ancient bridge crossing the river Xallas, with much Roman history in the region. Recommended.

title: (15863) A Baña - 16 Lugar Couto Carballo
description: Motorhome area in A Baña

title: (15850) Zas - 16 Rúa Igrexa
description: Quiet place to do the zas water route, then I recommend eating at Tivoli pizzeria.

title: (15684) O Empalme - 17 Lugar Brandoñas
description: Picnic area with barbecues and wooden picnic tables and swings. A bit neglected the swings and the grass.

title: (15873) Valle del Dubra - 126 DP-1914
description: Parking area reserved for motorhomes. Completely flat. Quiet and silent place. Next to a river and with space to walk. Supermarket, pharmacy, bars, gas stations, etc, 2 minutes walk

name: Camping Costa da Morte
title: (15851) Camping Costa da Morte
description:
Enjoy nature in its purest form at Camping Costa da Morte, without a doubt these are the words that best define us.

We are a family campsite located in rural Galicia, surrounded by leafy trees and a small river, where we want to unite our three great passions: family, nature and freedom.

We are in the Zas town hall, a key point from which to visit the entire Costa da Morte. A magical place that we are proud to be able to share with all of you, where you can enjoy incredible architectural jewels, mills, fulling mills, lighthouses, spectacular routes, carballeiras, waterfalls, beaches and cliffs that are unique in the world. Because Galicia is unique and Costa da Morte simply falls in love.

From our campsite we will give you all the information possible so that you can enjoy your stay to the fullest, get to know our surroundings, our culture and gastronomy.

We have 6 bungalows for 4, 6 and 8 people, 1 of them adapted for people with reduced mobility, 10 plots (40m2 each) for rent by the day or season for motorhomes, campers or caravans that include an area with shaders to enjoy them to the maximum and a 1000m2 camping area where you can enjoy nature in its purest form.

Our common services include:

- Bathrooms men / women / disabled

- Men / women / disabled showers

- Baby changer

- Supermarket

- Laundry

- Vending area with: microwave, toaster, coffee maker, tv

- Area sinks, basin and sinks

- Washing and vacuum area

- Bicycle parking

- Access to river

-Food trucks

We also offer you a series of additional services so that you can enjoy the maximum possible comfort during your stay, these services include:

- Full fridge

- Sweet and salty breakfast

- Santiago and Coruña airport pick up

- Transfer to any point of the Costa da Morte

- Decoration of bungalows according to type of event (birthdays, anniversaries...)

- Meals on request

- Fish, fruit, vegetables and meat directly from the Costa da Morte to your camping plot

- Visit to the farm

title: (15859) A Gris - 1 Lugar Gris
description:
Tourist Camp Santa María de Brandoñas.
Installation of rural tourism with complete area for motorhomes and places for overnight.
Quiet place, with all services and very clean.
Chalets and pitches are also available

title: (15839) A Baña - Fiopans
description: Picnic area on the edge of a small river under the oaks and eucalyptus, with toilets, water point, barbecues and tables. Access to the undergrowth with a van, but too narrow for a motorhome. Very quiet, we were alone in August. To get there, do not follow the dirt roads (there are several accesses), but go through the hamlet of Fiopans, a branch to the east takes you to the recreational area.

title: (15830) Negreira - 20 Rúa Castelao
description: Wastewater emptying service and clean filling. Dirt and level parking directly opposite. Next to emergencies and Civil Guard, very central.

title: (15830) Negreira - 11 Avenida Santiago
description: Automatic laundry, with several washing machines and dryers. Different sizes and prices.

title: (15851) Zas - 5 AC-404
description: Magical forest with tables and barbecues. A little run down but beautiful place.

title: (15147) Coristanco - 4 Lugar Fornelos
description: Picnic area next to the Coristanco soccer field. Quiet and level parking next to a picnic area with barbecues, playground and a good grove of trees. Quite well maintained and with a municipal swimming pool about 150 meters away.

title: (15151) Dumbría - Unnamed Road
description: Recreational area ..... quiet! narrow access road. There is water and toilets, but they were closed when we passed.

title: (15151) O Couquiño - Unnamed Road
description: Place to spend the night with beautiful views. Don't go in bad weather. No services.

title: (15150) A Coruña - 3 Lugar Baio Grande
description: Ample public parking very quiet and flat next to the town of Baio, ideal for spending the night. From there you can take a nice river walk and visit the Carballeira Municipal de Baio. There is a cafeteria next door. If you want to do some kind of shopping (supermarket, pharmacy, bakery, etc.), you can walk to the center of town very quickly.

title: (15150) Zas - 6 Rúa Campo do Rollo
description:
Constant water source with a picnic area.
You can park on the street.

title: (15839) Negreira - 24 Calle del Puente Maceira
description: Parking, somewhat inclined, with water. I asked the townspeople and there is no problem to spend the night. 10 minutes walk from Ponte Maceiras. Just declared "Beautiful town of Spain"

title: (15839) Ons - 13 Ons
description: laundry fountain

title: (15147) San Roque (Coristanco) - 6 Avenida Fisterra
description: Repsol gas station with area for motorhomes. It has water, gray and black water service. Friendly staff

title: (15870) Ames - Aldea Mámoa
description: Quiet place next to a church. Several places possible but we were alone. Good for one night.

title: (15238) Chacin - DP-4502
description: Place at the foot of the road to eat or rest for a while. There are three tables and room for about 5 campers, a small stream marked by a 2-minute path; Nice place.

title: (15238) Mazaricos -
description: Parking very quiet day and night, with easy access just behind the hermitage and just 25m from a beautiful waterfall which is heard from the parking area.

title: (15258) Mazaricos - Rua Monte Picoto
description: Motorhome area of ​​Mazaricos.

title: (15151) Dumbría - DP-3404
description: Ample parking to rest or eat, with tables and shade. Children's games

title: (15129) Vimianzo - 12 Camiño do Campo Fútbol
description: Quiet site in the village of Vimianzo, near the castle. Gas station, supermarket.

title: (15129) Vimianzo - 54a Rúa Trasariz
description: Service area for Motorhomes / Campers / Caravans, has 11 parking spaces, gray and black water drainage point. Drinking water filling, tap with thread. Next to the municipal soccer field of Vimianzo, where there are garbage containers. The squares are quite level (with a certain slope), without shade. The Castle of Vimianzo can be accessed on foot, about 500 m from the town.

name: Parking O Fogar da Risco
title: (15150) Parking O Fogar da Risco
description: Quiet place, the restaurant next door is the one who manages it, they let you use their toilets when it is open, but the hours are quite limited. Maximum stay 72 hours. Plenty of room to manoeuvre. Land with gravel and some weeds that are born in the middle. Push-button water tap without thread. Walking a bit there is a small walk along the river (A Fonte de Fornelos) with a swing for children, it is not much but it is the only activity that can be done without moving the car. Next to the bar there are little animals (also from the same owner) that can be seen from the road (ducks, cows, geese, etc).

title: (15129) Vimianzo - 116 Lugar Vimianzo
description: Automatic laundry. There is a place to park the Ac next door. 8 a.m. to 11 p.m. Every day of the year

title: (15129) Vimianzo - 47 Rúa Trasariz
description: Ample parking in this area. Very interesting to visit the castle (free). Craftswomen display their work and sell in the different rooms of the castle.

title: (15129) Vimianzo - 67 Rúa Trasariz
description: Parking for the Eroski supermarket, but has facilities to empty gray water, fill-up water and empty your chemical toilet. Did not sleep here, but just emptied and filled the van.

title: (15119) - 32 Lugar Briño
description:
Picnic area isolated in nature, completely flat and without noise pollution.
accessible by road with a slightly narrow passage without difficulty for L2 van with bicycle rack (approximately 6.50m)

title: (15102) Carballo - 18 Avenida Revolta
description: Valcarce Gasoline. They have water where the tire inflator and it comes out with more force than in other places.

title: (15147) Coristanco - 21 Lugar Ervelleira
description: Very quiet place to spend the day and take the excursion to the "green refuge", 20 m. The path that takes us to that charming corner begins, there is no sign that prevents parking, the only drawback is that there is not much telephone coverage, otherwise, a haven of peace next to the church, without annoying noises, just birds. we respect the environment so that this beautiful place does not deteriorate

title: (15147) Verdes - 6 Lugar Morazas
description: To park to see the M9linos de Verdes, without using the car parks of the two bars of the refuge de Verdes. Also, I have my doubts that a motorhome can get closer than this to the waterfalls.

title: (15119) A Coruña - AC-430
description: Fountain, small flow but sufficient to fill the bottles with drinking water.

title: (15102) Carballo - 14 Rúa Eduardo Blanco Amor
description: Very close to Mercadona to supply and visit the town

title: (15102) Carballo - 23 Rúa Vicente Risco
description: Level parking with several places. Ideal for vans, since the squares do not have much depth for motorhomes. It is next to the bus station. It has a supermarket and a cafeteria within walking distance.

title: (15119) A Coruña - 44 DP-1404
description:
Parking to visit the beautiful dolmen of Dombate (free).
Quiet.

title: (15129) Bribes - 4 Lugar Bribes
description: Hidden and small picnic area for 2 campers (you have to give some space for the road). There are 2 large tables and barbecue area. It has an entrance to this very flat zone, the rest is not very flat

title: (15106) Carballo - 23 Rúa Perú
description: Site to park and spend the night in the heart of the town, safe and with everything at hand. Thursdays are the local fair, so it is very difficult to park in the morning. Right in front there is another car park but it is smaller, even at the end of the dead end street, there is another area even quieter than that, it is one of the streets that surrounds the car park that has no exit.

title: (15107) Carballo - 2 Rua Enrique Sanchez
description: In the area of Coruña to Santiago de Compostela, there was no park4night inside. There is a rest area with load and load at 9 km, but it is noisy and isolated. This car park in the city center seemed to me better. There are two or three big ones in the area. This one has long stalls and my 6-meter motorhome has to do with it. The night is empty, the morning is filled with cars. But I slept well.

title: (15100) Carballo - 80-84 Avenida Malpica
description: Repsol Gas Station. very kind

title: (15128) Vimianzo - 17 Lugar Grixoa
description: Picnic area with 3 tables in the middle of the fields, clean and quiet place with a water point.

title: (15865) Brión - 1 Rúa Gondar
description: Flat parking in a very quiet area behind the Carballeira de Brión. Nearby there is a fountain where you can catch water, as well as an area with picnic tables and a playground.

title: (15107) Carballo - 6 Rúa Médico José Manuel Lado
title_short: (15107) Carballo - 6 Rúa Médico José Manuel Lado
description: There is always a space day and night, a quiet place, although I recommend parking as close to the main road as possible.

title: (15100) Carballo - 31 Avenida Razo
description: Laundry. Ample parking 50 meters across the road. 25 parking spaces.

title: (15116) As Grelas - 76 Estrada Buño Laxe
description: Parking with the possibility of spending the night, some spaces are quite level. Boardwalk with children's area.

title: (15115) A Coruña - 17 Estrada Buño Laxe
description:
One of the best places.
It's hard arrive with some vans.

title: (15118) Laxe - 28 Lugar Matio
description: Picnic space, it has round stone tables, nature, parking for about 10 or 12 places, calm and quiet

title: (15110) Ponteceso - Av. Anllons
description: Nice and quiet place next to the river without services

title: (15145) A Laracha - 20 Santa Margarida
description: Santa Margarita de Montemayor, in the town hall of Laracha, A Coruña. Free parking, with many services in A Taberna Restaurant, which is just 10 meters away. In the area there is a route to visit different churches and chapels, the "two muiños" route, both to be done on foot or by mountain bike. Just 2 kilometers away is A Silva, where there are supermarkets and a gas station and in summer a free public swimming pool. It is also close, 10 minutes by car, from the Cerceda Aquapark and beaches such as Razo, Baldayo or Caión. The Restaurant is currently only open from Friday to Sunday, it is always advisable to reserve a table for breakfast, lunch or dinner. From Monday to Friday it is very quiet in the whole place, but on Saturdays and Sundays it is usually more crowded by customers of the Restaurant. Black water can NOT be emptied.

title: (15220) Bertamiráns - 14 Calle Rueiro
description: Quiet free parking all day, with grassy area and river. Shops a few minutes walk.

title: (15110) Ponteceso - Nº1 Rúa Paseo Fluvial
description: River walk next to a park. Perfect to rest. Very calm.

title: (15110) Ponteceso - 34 AC-419
description: Automatic laundry, dryer. Parking in the street if you find a supermarket place for shopping, butchers and banks at the street cinema.

title: (15108) Carballo - 1 Lugar Rega
description: Cheap full-fill gas station with free drinking water. Very friendly staff. I rate this place because there is no drinking water fountain on the beach and it is very practical to find one!

title: (15110) Ponteceso - 3 Estrada Corme-Ponteceso
description: Parking next to the road that goes from Ponteceso to Corme. The PR-G 148 route passes through here, towards Corme or Ponteceso, ideal for reaching Praia de Barra on foot. Squares without inclination. I do not know if you can spend the night but I suspect that it will be a noisy place as it is next to the road.

title: (15287) Serra de Outes - 7 Rua Vistaalegre
description: Very nice and quiet place, where a path next to the river goes down, allowing you to follow the path of the lamprey. There are restaurants 250 meters and a bakery 400. Possibility to swim in the river. Source with drinking water. We spent the night without problem. Many friends of neighbors.

title: (15116) Taboído -
description: Small beach with easy access, ideal to spend the day or the night, perhaps, parking is a bit expensive, we have not had any problems, white sand, blue water and there is nobody in the area.

title: (15151) Dumbría - AC-442
description: Excellent free RV area. With gray and black drainage. Pay attention to as much detail as possible. Lawns and freshly cut gardens. Next to a recreation area with picnic and barbecue area in a beautiful Carballeira. Many thanks to the Dumbría City Council for this project. Baker at the gas station on the main street

title: (15110) Ponteceso - 51 Avenida Bergantiños
description: Motorhome area in Ponteceso

title: (15151) Dumbría - AC-442
description: Picnic break at the river's edge. Quiet place and water available. We did not spend the night but in my opinion it's quiet enough to do it.

title: (15220) Bertamiráns - Rúa das Pesqueiras
description: Curious service area along the city sidewalk, but it exists and is free

title: (15220) Bertamiráns - 6 Rúa das Pesqueiras
description: Clean and reliable coin laundry, there is also to wash the dog. There are USB points to charge the mobile.

title: (15896) Roxos - 185 Rúa de Muros
description: Self-service water

title: (15116) San Pedro -
description: Nice place on a small beautiful beach, with parking space, Max 10 cars, but diagonally. With public shower. Approach route is very narrow and large angle of inclination. No prohibition signs for staying overnight.

title: (15110) Balarés - CP-6803
description: Silent night scenic spot

title: (15220) Aldea Nova -
description: Parking and private long-stay motorhome garage. Ideal to leave the vehicle during the Camino de Santiago, or to spend long periods of time.

title: (15220) Ames - CTRA.SANTIAGO-NOIA
description: Number of places: 30 to 40. All in a service station of Los Ángeles gas group. There are all fuels, including LPG, electric charging and butane and propane cylinders. The use of the installations implies a minimum consumption of 25 euros in the facilities where the car park is located. Those who refuel with motorhome enjoy a special discount and immediate. It has a washing area with pressure machines of a height adapted to the vehicles and to the suction zone. • night Yes Maximum stay 2 nights • Water. YES • Empty gray water. YES • Drainage of wastewater. YES • Public WC. YES • Cafeterias in the same neighborhood (three meters from the car park). At 3 kilometers another station of the same group with restaurant and musical entertainment on weekends. The population of Bertamiráns at 1 kilometer. • Supermarket in the area with many references to fresh fruits and vegetables, dairy products, frozen foods and cleaning products. It also has clean product references for motorhomes (Thetford brand) • Bus 50 meters to Santiago and Noia with not every 20 minutes. Mechanical workshops at 50 meters • Beach in Noia at 30.3 km and Finisterre at 73.7 km. • WIFI If there are adapted toilets and a cloakroom for babies). Signage • Access Signals: From the highway and the road, the service station is displayed and signs appear on the road. • Signage of the area: Yes Observations For the creation of the space dedicated to campers and the specific service, we counted on the advice of the Galician Association of motor homes: to be located in a service station offers a wide range of services. Located on the road that connects Santiago de Compostela to the beaches and to Finisterra, on the Camino de Santiago.

title: (15117) Laxe - 81 Rúa Cabo da Area
description: Parking of sports center, soccer field and school. There are marked places for buses. When you cross the road, you will find the municipal swimming pool, the picnic area and the swings. Try to avoid parking when entering and leaving school or sporting events so as not to disturb. Ideal during school holidays. The ideal is to park at the picnic area during the day and at the sports center at night.

title: (15117) Laxe - 1 Rúa Cabo da Area
description: Gas station Petronor. Dismiss gray and black and fill with clean water. Without limitation of height or size.

title: (15117) Laxe - 1 Rúa Cabo da Area
description: Parking next to the gas station and the road. Enabled by removing the parking that was located in front and closest to the beach.

title: (15151) Dumbría - AC-552
description: Repsol service station. Very well ! Very clean ! Very functional! Recently created installation.

title: (15110) Ponteceso - 65 Lugar Pazos Arriba
description: Valcarce station and service with free water draining and gray water emptying service. fuel and LPG

title: (15151) Dumbría - DP-3404
description: Away from the A Coruña road, quiet parking lot, lit all night, slight slope, picnic tables, garbage cans but no service

title: (15118) Finllido - 25 Avenida Isidro Parga Pondal
description: Self-service Laundry Hours from 8am to 10pm every day

title: (15110) Ponteceso - CP-6803
description: Very very quiet place, excellent to spend a few days in a spectacular natural environment. Pine forests and the sea coexist in the middle of the Costa da Morte, in one of the few calm waters in the area. Highly recommended.

title: (15110) Ponteceso - Unnamed Road
description: Port parking lot at the end of the street with the possibility of turning. The lifeguard explicitly said that there are often campers there and the local police drove by 5 times and we were able to spend the night. At 1:00 a.m. on Friday night, a couple of teenagers came with their cars. But they left after 15 minutes. The beach bar at the beginning of the street is highly recommended!

title: (15110) Balarés - 3 Lugar Balares
description: Great farm enabled to park in a wonderful environment, next to a pine forest and access to the beach. We slept great.

title: (15117) Lage - 41 Avenida Cesáreo Pondal
description: Free parking, it is an esplanade of earth and grass, 100 meters from the promenade and the beach, without any service. Nearby are containers. At the entrance to the beach there are showers and a fountain. 5 min. walk from the town center with shops and restaurants. Beautiful beach and very good to go with the family. It is interesting to take the excursion to the Laxe lighthouse, which is circular for about 6 km with exceptional views. We have spent a very quiet night together with more cars and vans, please do not use the esplanade as a shitting place! Let's keep it clean!!

title: (15117) Lage - 1 Paseo Marítimo
description: If the large area just before is complete or if it is made inaccessible by the rain this blind road is for you. Quiet at this time of year, facing the sea and a promenade with nearby garbage cans. In summer you can use the beach showers. Convenient to get to the center from the seafront.

title: (15118) Boaño - 1 Lugar Boaño
description: In the middle of the forest, next to a picnic table and games for children. Just above the beach of Traba (water point and shower on the beach) and 6 km walk from Laxe.

title: (15212) Roo de Abaixo -
description: We did not find anything for park4night in this area and leaving the Do Tambre suspension bridge and power plant towards Santiago de Compostela we found this perfect spot for dinner or overnight. It is more or less flat and shaded by trees. Few cars pass, they do not bother.

title: (15898) Santiago de Compostela - 1 Monte Pedroso
description: View of Santiago de Compostela, from the antennas

title: (15118) Laxe - Mordomo
description: Beautiful location on the dunes. We arrived around 5 pm and all places were taken but after half an hour of waiting they became available. Beach accessible via a beautifully landscaped path. Bakery not far away and restaurant nearby. Nice walk along the coast to the next village of Canelle.

title: (15282) Rois - 23 AC-543
description: Galp station on the way to Noia. Very friendly manager. We bought him a beer and he told us that there was no problem staying and even using the toilet. It closes at 10pm. Very quiet, quiet and almost perfectly flat.

title: (15118) Laxe - Unnamed Road
description: Place of grass accessible by a small dirt road, beautiful view and access to the beach.

title: (15117) Laxe - Unnamed Road
description: Parking at the port, full of AC and also fishermen at night, quiet.

title: (15111) Malpica de Bergantiños - 16 Rúa Santa Catalina
title_short: (15111) Malpica de Bergantiños - 16 Rúa Santa Catalina
description: Wide esplanade in a quiet area, it is in Buño, a pottery town of the oldest and most important in Spain, next to there is a supermarket, a restaurant where you eat great, a pharmacy and shops where you can buy local crafts that are really precious.

title: (15110) Balarés - Unnamed Road
description: Ideal for watching the sunset and possibly spending a night here. Two more cars came at sunset, otherwise completely quiet except for a few hikers and cyclists! Since it is a gravel road, only recommended with a van or car.

title: (15118) Laxe - Rúa Santa Rosa
description: Parking of the praia of Soesto, no services but source, calm and very pleasant access to the village of LAXE by the coastal path

title: (15117) Laxe - 2 Rúa Rosalía de Castro
description: Quiet parking near the port. 4 sites for motorhomes. At 800m. from the crystal beach

title: (15898) Correxins - Estrada do Pedroso
description: Above Santiago de Compostela .. nice place with a view of the surrounding area ... not Santiago .. you have to drive about 1000 meters further .. Good access for campers but watch out. Navi wanted to guide me through narrow streets ..

title: (15129) Camariñas - Rúa Calzada
description: Small picnic area with 3 tables and a grill. The river passes right next to it with a bridge to be able to walk and see the river from the other bank. Dirt track, difficult to access but very beautiful place.

title: (15898) Santiago de Compostela - Estrada do Pedroso
title_short: (15898) Santiago de Compostela - Estrada do Pedroso
description: Picnic area in Monte Pedroso. It is quite flat and outside of meal times, when there may be more people, the site is very quiet and with plenty of shaded areas. There are many places in the area where you can park for the afternoon and overnight. Very close to Santiago de Compostela, ideal to visit.

title: (15118) Laxe - Unnamed Road
description: At the end of the path to Arnado beach. Small parking without any service above the beach. Great view of the sunset and crystal clear water of this white sand beach. Perfect ! A hiking trail leads to Playa Soesto and continues to the village of Laxe.

title: (15287) Outes - Unnamed Road
description: picnic area facing the sea, very quiet

title: (15898) Santiago de Compostela - 93 Santo Ignacio do Monte
title_short: (15898) Santiago de Compostela - 93 Santo Ignacio do Monte
description: Parking of the natural park overlooking Santiago. Very quiet, no insecurity, many hiking trails, children's playground, two water points, bins, less than 10min drive from the historic center. Breathtaking views of the Cathedral of Santiago de Compostela. We highly recommend.

title: (15898) Santiago de Compostela -
description: Flat land, in the middle of the forest. Hiker parking lot

title: (15111) Malpica de Bergantiños - 13 Tremoa
description: Drinking water

title: (15117) Laxe - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful place with incredible views. Stone picnic tables

title: (15684) Órdenes - Vilagudín
description: Flat surface spot for picknick or spending the night. View over the lake and dam. There is a bit run down picknick area next to the parking. We spent the night without any problem.

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 11 Rúa do Avío de Abaixo
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 11 Rúa do Avío de Abaixo
description: Non-potable water source near the center of Santiago

title: (15117) Laxe - Unnamed Road
description: Small area next to the lighthouse where you can park about 5 vehicles. There is no prohibition sign. Small gap. Possibility to start routes from here

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 3 Rúa de Roberto Vidal Bolaño
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 3 Rúa de Roberto Vidal Bolaño
description: Parking 20 minutes walk from the cathedral, free, safe and quiet!  Nearby we recommend a restaurant to eat well and at good prices, 50 meters from the parking lot. Not recommended for campers over 6 meters.

title: (15210) Orro -
description: A small place that is first accessible via a narrow tar, then gravel road. There is only nature, no services

title: (15152) Dumbría - AC-552
description: A quiet place just off the main road.  On a bit of a slope and no services.

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 21 Avenida de Castelao
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 21 Avenida de Castelao
description:
Small car park with 20 spaces, including large ones that can accommodate motorhomes.
No visible prohibition but I think it is not appropriate to spend the night there.

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 48 Rúa de Vista Alegre
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 48 Rúa de Vista Alegre
description: We spent one night here, it is a quiet place to park level and 10 minutes walk from the cathedral of Santiago. There is space for 5 . Down the street there are more parking spaces next to the park, but we found it noisier. Ideal to visit the city in one day.

title: (15898) Santiago de Compostela - 1 Rúa do Bidueiro
title_short: (15898) Santiago de Compostela - 1 Rúa do Bidueiro
description: Free Parking along stretch of side road. Space for any size motorhome, 20 minute straight walk to the cathedral. Recommended!

title: (15114) Ponteceso - Estrada da Ermida
description: Quiet and perfect area to watch the sunset. Next to the beach. Arrive with a 6 m AC without problem

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - Rúa de José María Suárez Núñez
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - Rúa de José María Suárez Núñez
description: Free parking ideal for visiting the city of Santiago de Compostela. Very quiet, easy to find places unlike the area next door. We did not spend the night there but it seems possible if there is no prohibition sign about 1 km on foot from the cathedral.

address.street: Rúa de José María Suárez Núñez

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela -
description: Impeccable to visit Santiago, a quarter of an hour walk from the cathedral. We did not stay overnight but it is possible.

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 10 Estrada de San Lourenzo
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 10 Estrada de San Lourenzo
description: Quiet parking place, white area, we spent the night very quiet, 20 min walk from the cathedral. and back by taxi about 4 euros.

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - Rua de Vicente Fraiz Andon
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - Rua de Vicente Fraiz Andon
description: Spacious parking next to the university. Probably meant for students but not prohibited for others in any way.

title: (15704) Santiago de Compostela - Avenida do Burgo das Nacións
title_short: (15704) Santiago de Compostela - Avenida do Burgo das Nacións
description: Parking lot about 1.2 km to the cathedral.  No height limit.  Sideways to the road.  For motorhomes up to 7m (with a protrusion)

title: (15704) Santiago de Compostela - 36 Avenida de Castelao
title_short: (15704) Santiago de Compostela - 36 Avenida de Castelao
description: Super clean and cheap laundry service.

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 14 Rúa de Vista Alegre
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 14 Rúa de Vista Alegre
description: 800m from the cathedral..parking overlooking the park and the Auditorio de Galicia..no blue zone. shaded park with benches

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 17 Rúa do Luar do Carme
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 17 Rúa do Luar do Carme
description: Parkplatz, nur Kastenwagen

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 7 Rúa de Constantino Candeira
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 7 Rúa de Constantino Candeira
description: Gravel lot on the university campus. practically empty outside of the semester. A few cars came and went into the square at night, otherwise very quiet for a Friday evening.

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 116 Camiño dos Vilares
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 116 Camiño dos Vilares
description: Quiet place to sleep with the camper without raising the roof. Free

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - s/n Rúa de Tras Santa Isabel
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - s/n Rúa de Tras Santa Isabel
description: Parking 5 minutes from the cathedral. Not many places but ideal for visiting Santiago de Compostela. Free parking located next to the municipal stadium. Night prohibited.

address.street: s/n Rúa de Tras Santa Isabel

title: (15114) Ponteceso - 3 Estrada da Ermida
description: Nice place and beach access. Very calm. Be careful, a lot of cars in the day.

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 9 Rúa dos Pelamios
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 9 Rúa dos Pelamios
description: Small parking space for motorhomes up to 5m in length located 850m from the cathedral.

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 2A Avenida de Novoa Santos
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 2A Avenida de Novoa Santos
description: Parking. 15 minutes walking distance to the cathedral.

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 15 Rúa de José María Suárez Núñez
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 15 Rúa de José María Suárez Núñez
description: Very quiet place next to the faculty, the adjoining streets have a blue zone (this one does not have it) there is a faculty guard who passes several times by car, he does not say anything, we have spent the night very quiet, he has a park right in front and a garden, a car passes from time to time, nothing annoying

address.street: 15 Rúa de José María Suárez Núñez

title: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 39 Avenida do Mestre Mateo
title_short: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 39 Avenida do Mestre Mateo
description: Newly created street where you can park 24/7 for free. It is best to arrive before 7:30 a.m. or after 8:00 p.m., otherwise students will use it! For smaller rubbish there are rubbish bins all around. !!! This is curbside parking, neither straight nor quiet!!!

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 5 Rúa dos Pelamios
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 5 Rúa dos Pelamios
description: Shaded parking 5 minutes' walk from the cathedral, suitable for vans only

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 3 Rúa do Lavadoiro
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 3 Rúa do Lavadoiro
description: Place to stop to eat and take a walk around the city.

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 6 Rúa de José María Suárez Núñez
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 6 Rúa de José María Suárez Núñez
description: Parking to visit the city. We have spent a night without problems. 18 minutes from the cathedral. In the university area.

address.street: 6 Rúa de José María Suárez Núñez

title: (15297) Ézaro -
description: Beautiful wild place, not visible from the road, fairly straight meadow, beautiful view at sunset. we stayed here on a windy night with no problems. I think there is room for 5-6 campers. and I don't think anyone cares.

title: (15210) Noia - 13 Aldea Carracido
description: EROSKI gas station. Clean water

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 23 Rúa de Melide
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 23 Rúa de Melide
description: Automatic laundromat. Washing+drying. open from 10h to 22h, nice decor, very clean place

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - Avenida do Profesor Legaz Lagambra
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - Avenida do Profesor Legaz Lagambra
description: Parking in quiet blue area in summer, being a university area. Parking areas flat and covered with trees. 15 minutes walk from the cathedral.

title: (15258) A Coruña - Unnamed Road
description: Parking just before crossing the dam. About 7 spaces flat. We ended up there because on our way to the falls we came across a stretch of road where we were not allowed to go down with the camper (slope 30 %!) Police were on the lookout for people venturing there anyway. Quiet night, better protected from the wind than the parking at the viewpoint. Around 9 o'clock, some people do arrive and leave on hikes.

title: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 10 Rúa de Varela Montes
title_short: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 10 Rúa de Varela Montes
description: Parking next to the park, widely used by medium-sized motorhomes and vans, level, very close to the center, bus 20 meters away, restaurant and Vaquiña grill 30 meters away.

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 10 Rúa das Hortas
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 10 Rúa das Hortas
description: Lovely laundry room with patio to kick back and relax while you do your laundry. It is right at the foot of Obradoiro square so you can wash and take a walk while in the old town

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 8 Rúa Manuel María
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 8 Rúa Manuel María
description:
Area guarded and paid parking. Possibility to stay overnight but not super quiet.
For the day at 20 minute walk from downtown, Ideal.

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 33 Rúa das Tabaniscas
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 33 Rúa das Tabaniscas
description: Clean laundry room with free wifi.

title: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 20 Rúa das Tabaniscas
title_short: (15705) Santiago de Compostela - 20 Rúa das Tabaniscas
description: Parking near a junction between a station and a shop, we repaired for one night, 2km from the cathedral, a little passage at night.

title: (15114) Ponteceso - 5 Avenida Alto da Costa
description: Loading and unloading area in Corme-Puerto. It is in the arce of the same access road to the town. There is no parking, but shortly before reaching the left you can access the parking lot of Ermida beach

title: (15114) O Porto de Corme - 11 Rúa Carral
title_short: (15114) O Porto de Corme - 11 Rúa Carral
description: Parking next to the unpaved road. Next to the town and the road that leads to the lighthouse.

title: (15121) Camelle - 5 Rúa Área do Bote
description: Playground with fountain

title: (15110) Ponteceso - CP-6801
description: Viewpoint Monte Do lighthouse. With fountain in the entrance (that we have found). beaten earth. without services.

title: (15703) Santiago de Compostela - 2B Rúa do Cruceiro da Coruña
title_short: (15703) Santiago de Compostela - 2B Rúa do Cruceiro da Coruña
description: Gas station with LPG pump

title: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 5-7 Avenida de Syra Alonso
title_short: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 5-7 Avenida de Syra Alonso
description: Flat parking stabilized 3 km from the center of Saint-Jacques de Compostela and the cathedral. Parking specified in the world of camper December 2017. Located Syria Alonso street 100 m from a Lidl

title: (15703) Santiago de Compostela - 6-2 Rúa de Ramón del Valle-Inclán
title_short: (15703) Santiago de Compostela - 6-2 Rúa de Ramón del Valle-Inclán
description: Underground parking. You enter it with a Traffic. Limited 2m

title: (15114) Ponteceso - 3 Rúa Cubeiro
description: New ACS area in Corme. 5 spacious spaces all with electricity and water and emptying area.

title: (15146) A Laracha - Telleira Abaixo
description: Small area for loading and unloading. Free, and very useful. Along the driveway there are wooden tables. Clean and well maintained.

title: (15703) Santiago de Compostela - 45 Avenida de Rodríguez de Viguri
title_short: (15703) Santiago de Compostela - 45 Avenida de Rodríguez de Viguri
description:
Launderette on the main road. Possible to park behind the house, spacious place, if you also use the launderette. It's private land.
Prices are normal.
payment via machine (choice of different languages).

title: (15121) Camelle - 22 Camelle
description: Quiet and pleasant place to spend the day and the night

title: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 7 Rúa Doutor Maceira
title_short: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 7 Rúa Doutor Maceira
description: Land parking next to a school. Only for vans. There are several buildings around and bars. No services. 20 min walk from the center.

title: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 36 Rúa de Feliciano Barrera Fernández
title_short: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 36 Rúa de Feliciano Barrera Fernández
description: Very large and guarded parking a few meters from the center, it has quite a slope but there is a lot of space

name: AC Praia de Broña area.
title: () AC Praia de Broña area.
description: Area with two parking spots that you can stay up to two hours. Free services. But you can park in the parking space that are shared with cars like the comment from Outes police. You can stay and overnight but no opening awning, taking tables, chairs and etc… please respect to keep this area open for us.

title: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 22 Avenida de Romero Donallo
title_short: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 22 Avenida de Romero Donallo
description: Underground covered parking in Av. Romero Donallo. Height 2.20m. Ideal for Camper vans type California / Viano / ... to visit Santiago.

title: (15703) Santiago de Compostela - 21 N-550
description: Laundry room with washing machine and dryer, when taken from the photo the place was not yet finished, but it exists. Automatic laundry. nice decoration, very clean place

title: (15185) Cerceda - 26 Lugar Estacion Queixas
description: It is one of the stations on the greenway, it is good to know which ones are on the entire greenway in case you have to go pick up a straggler.

title: (15703) Santiago de Compostela - 1 Rúa das Trompas
title_short: (15703) Santiago de Compostela - 1 Rúa das Trompas
description: Parking height 2.3m 350m from the cathedral. Shared parking with a hotel so seems safe. Flat with clean toilet. Another car park a little further down the street, with no height limits but not flat.

title: (15895) O Milladoiro - Rúa Buxo
description: Paved and tarred parking, no service but drain terminal 150 m further. Perfect for a day and visit Santiago 6 km. Park rather up. Parking in the ground 100 m lower facing the modern church for one night, to see.

title: (15124) O Castro - 1 Lugar Castro
description: Picnic area, with tables, fountain and good shade, next to a chapel and near the Castro river and its pools. Parking for a few cars. Calm neighborhood. Watch out for mosquitoes. Motorhomes, careful with access, tight curves at the end.

title: (15895) O Milladoiro - 2 Travesía do Porto
description: Self service laundry inside the shopping centre, near the supermarket. Good price and machines worked well.

title: (15297) Dumbría - DP-2308
description: Parking at the Ezaro viewpoint, near the falls, great place to visit them. There are about 20 parking spaces.

title: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 81 Avenida de Ferrol
title_short: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 81 Avenida de Ferrol
description: Public car park without services, recently opened, ideal for visiting the city. Paid only during the day between 10:00 and 20:30. Free night. Surrounded by services, supermarkets, pharmacy, restaurants, bars, etc. Very easy to access.

title: (15707) Santiago de Compostela - 2B Rúa da Fonte dos Concheiros
title_short: (15707) Santiago de Compostela - 2B Rúa da Fonte dos Concheiros
description: Clothes washing and drying machines, for a fee. When the photograph of the premises was taken, the work had not yet been done, but it exists. Automatic laundry. open from 10am to 10pm, nice decoration, very clean place

title: (15214) Lousame - 19 AC-308
description: Route of the Paper Mills: Beginning of the route with a recreational area with tables and stone benches, areas for grilling. Very shady with many trees. It has a source of drinking water and a river. The route starts from here. Little parking area shortly before arriving.

title: (15703) Santiago de Compostela - 10 Avenida de Rodríguez de Viguri
title_short: (15703) Santiago de Compostela - 10 Avenida de Rodríguez de Viguri
description: Parking enabled in a field ... Nearby construction.

title: (15703) Santiago de Compostela - 4 Rúa da Angustia
title_short: (15703) Santiago de Compostela - 4 Rúa da Angustia
description: When the photograph was taken, the location had not yet been made, but it exists. Automatic laundry. open from 10am to 10pm, nice decoration, very clean place

title: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 16 Rúa da Benéfica de Conxo
title_short: (15706) Santiago de Compostela - 16 Rúa da Benéfica de Conxo
description:
Covered motorhome parking, free from rain. Closed warehouse of 1000m2, central, ideal for getting to know the city and with a good location. The only car park from which you can walk to the cathedral. Water and electricity connection included in the price. It is not allowed to display items outside the motorhome. We don't have showers. The purpose of the car park is to park to get to know the city, park for a few days to do the Camino de Santiago and sleep. We work only with reservation, and only by WhatsApp.

€16/1 day
€12/following
€70/week

Transfer service to Sarria and other places in Galicia. Consult

name: Camping Sisargas
title: (15112) Camping Sisargas
description: Camping Sisargas. Excellent space near the Costa de la Muerte. To spend a night or several days. It has all the services (WC, showers, washer / dryer, daily fresh bread, restaurant, swimming pool, children's area and swings, fountain, barbecue area, library, WiFi spot at the bar. Free black and grey drainage). Pets allowed. Open area with or without shade. grassy surface. near 2 big towns and 10 beaches, with hikes and beautiful scenery.

title: (15114) Guxín -
description: Secluded parking lot on a secluded beach. Very steep and narrow driveway. There is space for a maximum of two small campers. A really nice place to spend the day. We don't know if it's allowed to spend the night. No Services.

title: (15702) Santiago de Compostela - 5 Rúa do Pintor Laxeiro
title_short: (15702) Santiago de Compostela - 5 Rúa do Pintor Laxeiro
description: Hundreds of parking spaces 24 hours, next to the station and gas station. According to a local very safe. Maybe just for a very large motorhome. Quite full but many places. It is in the blue zone from 10-14 hours approximately 3. We spent the night without problem.

title: (15210) Noia - 74 Aldea Abruñeiras
description: Parking next to the beach, with level spaces. Very quiet area, there is no movement of vehicles as it is a dead end street. Very good option for a night without discomfort.

title: (15895) Ames - Travesía do Porto
description: Vacant land 50 m after a flat and calm marker.

title: (15111) Malpica - Bicerran
description: Very good secluded place to spend the night, there are no showers if grills and garbage containers, very good views of the sea.

title: (15146) A Laracha - 30 Lugar Cancelo Abaixo
description: Large parkinģ in a dead end with no traffic. There is a small wood just behind, handy if you have a dog. There is no service but at 850m there is a motorhome area. This car park has the advantage of being a little quieter for sleeping.

title: (15895) Ames - 9 Rúa Agro do Medio
description: Self-service laundry.

name: Camping As Cancelas (Santiago de Compostela)
title: (15703) Camping As Cancelas (Santiago de Compostela)
description: The campsite is well located for visiting Compostela and the Cathedral. On foot or by bus. The sanitary facilities are clean and well maintained. The steep driveway is not a problem as many write.

title: (15707) Santiago de Compostela - 27 Rúa da Raxeira
title_short: (15707) Santiago de Compostela - 27 Rúa da Raxeira
description: Large parking area. Close to shopping and downtown area.

title: (15200) Noya - 7 Paseo Poeta Avilés de Taramancos
title_short: (15200) Noya - 7 Paseo Poeta Avilés de Taramancos
description: Self service laundry. There is a large carpark across the road. Washing machines and dryer .

title: (15121) Camariñas - 35 Rua Paxaros
description: Pitches on the quay of the small port. close to a little busy road. calm, nice view.

title: (15703) Santiago de Compostela - Rúa do Doiro
title_short: (15703) Santiago de Compostela - Rúa do Doiro
description: Very large parking for buses and camper vans, only from 8 a.m. to 8 p.m., municipal ban on sleeping in the car park. The exit barrier remains open after 8 p.m., 2 km from the center.

title: (15702) Santiago de Compostela Spain - 41 Lugar Puente Pereda
title_short: (15702) Santiago de Compostela Spain - 41 Lugar Puente Pereda
description: This place is about 20 minutes away from the cathedral uneven but perfect for visiting Santiago de Compostela. We spent the night here and it was quiet. Lots of people were walking dogs here.

title: (15200) Noia - 25 AC-311
description: Here you can buy Repsol bottles without formalities. 28 euros complete price 10.2022

title: (15107) Carballo - 25 Rúa Paseo Praia
description: 8 oblique parking spaces large enough for our RV, great views on the beach and an unbeatable place to spend the night if you do not mind sleeping listening to break the waves

title: (15688) A Estación de Trasmonte - 2 Lugar Garga
title_short: (15688) A Estación de Trasmonte - 2 Lugar Garga
description: Small picnic area, 5 or 6 vehicles can be parked, we have spent the night without any problem. next to a greenway, next to some houses

title: (15105) Carballo - DP-1909
description: A rest area on a little-used road with a fantastic view of the sea. I think you can "take a break" for a night here.

title: (15200) Noia - 9 Rúa Pintor Francisco Creo
description: Ample free parking near the center, no service.

title: (15702) Santiago de Compostela - 74D Rúa de Sar
title_short: (15702) Santiago de Compostela - 74D Rúa de Sar
description: Place to spend a night 10 minutes from the center, little traveled by paved road, quiet place with a small green area

title: () Noia - Unnamed Road
description: Free parking at the port. No service. Calm to spend the night.

title: (15121) Arou - 21 Rúa Praia
description: Free parking on the seafront near the village, perfect for lovers of wild coast and quiet, delicate access with a motorhome over 6 m, no service.

title: (15702) Santiago de Compostela - 74D Rúa de Sar
title_short: (15702) Santiago de Compostela - 74D Rúa de Sar
description: Only for small vans! Free, center 10 mins. walk. Close to railway, so some noise at night.

title: (15121) Camariñas - 35 Rua Paxaros
description: Great place for a night, picnic tables, toilets and shower nearer the main beach. very quiet, stunning views. also a drinking bar close by.

title: (15295) Carnota - Unnamed Road
description: Parking of a point of view on the Ria de Muros bay. The entrance is blocked by big stones so big campers won't be able to enter. Not sure if it is allowed to sleep here, but we did and you wake up with a wonderful view.

title: (15107) Carballo - 21 Rúa Paseo Arenal
description: Free municipal parking area. Second sea line, no views but the place is quiet and flat. No services.

title: (15111) Malpica - Escras
description: Small parking lot near the access to the beach, trash can available, two roads possible one in earth (arriving from the west) and the other tarred (arriving from the east), almost flat with room for several vans and or motorhome.

title: (15707) Santiago de Compostela - 1 Rúa de Castela e León
title_short: (15707) Santiago de Compostela - 1 Rúa de Castela e León
description: GALIOIL Service Station, recently opened in the Costa Vella polygon. It has Drainage of Gray Water, Black Water and water tap.

title: (15107) Carballo - Rúa Paseo Praia
description: Parking near the beach. beach shower and water not drinkable. toilets open during bathing hours.

title: (15145) Laracha - 2 Avenida Manuel Fraga Iribarne
description: Ample parking. In a very quiet area.

title: (15200) Noia - 4 Rúa de Pedra Sartaña
description: Quiet public parking next to the free promenade. Without services Well located.

title: (15707) Santiago de Compostela - 11 Rúa das Fontes do Sar
title_short: (15707) Santiago de Compostela - 11 Rúa das Fontes do Sar
description: Small parking lot next to a huge park, some municipal swimming pools, soccer field, paddle tennis courts and trail areas. Very close to Santiago de Compostela. Part of the parking lot is a bit inclined. We slept without any noise in the middle of August.
